channel.title: [PI] Teleporting

item.title: [PI] Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:
@xtylerr wrote:

Hello, I’m trying to make it so when I click on varrock teleport, it brings me to edgeville.

I put this code into action handler, and it won’t work.

case 4140: c.getPA().startTeleport(3093, 3493, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You teleport to edgeville."); break;

4140 is the action button ID for varrock teleport, please tell me what I did wrong, thanks.

Edit: I needed to put it into clicking buttons, and the code looked like this:

case 4140: c.getPA().startTeleport(3093, 3493, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("You teleport to edgeville."); break;

Read full topic
